channel.title: [Character Sheet] Clash Online. {E,C,D}
channel.description:
https://external-preview.redd.it/iSUnrLXMPviG-fyV6tCi5FLLeCi7wH5BpYU_H3s8yp0.png?width=1024&s=60ca7b3e3aed698119847a9aa7f98d49ea0ce1a2
Umu! It's Shurian! _You can call me Umu-san._ Welcome to Clash Online! You've seen me everywhere in the city, on billboards, and television! Well...```
Not everything is ready yet... The servers need setting up... The characters need to be made! So whaddya say we have a little creativity?
What do I mean by creativity? Umu, allow me to explain! You all need characters to be in the game{EDITOR'S NOTE: Role Play} right? Well, you'll be needing these character sheets!
Ehh? What do you mean you don't hav- Oh, Umu... You guys don't have the beta tester's booklet! Well, here's how it works. Praise me!
> ## Name > Level 1 - 20 EXP to Level Up HP: 20/20 MP: 20/20 PVP Rank- Newbie World Completion Rate: 0% {World Completion will be something like Guild Wars 2' archetype} STR: 5 DEX: 5 STA: 5 Starting Weapon Type: Sword / Staff / Bow {+20 Arrows} Equipment: Beginner's Armour- Beginner's Leggings - Beginner's Gloves - Beginner's Shoes Inventory: Shuribag {20 slots} {Starting Anniversary Present!} Water- 10 Servings Bread- 10 Servings Wallet: 50 Shuricoins
Please do include a brief inclusion of your character, be it in words or picture.
# Starter's Shop ```Hai Hai! It's your dear Umu-san! You can't be expecting to go into the world without extra supplies! Oh... Food is important here too! It can fill up your belly in the outside world too! Umu? What do you mean they can? Through our energy infusion technology in our headsets, anyone can be filled by eating food in game! Umu. Aren't I a genius?```
_(EDITOR'S NOTE: But... this shop is full of consumables...)_ ```Ah! Shut up! The food and water will be transmitted into your body, don't worry! The taste too!```
- [color=red]Small HP Potion[/color]- 2 Shuricoin {Restores 10 HP}- - [color=blue]Small MP Potion[/color]- 2 Shuricoin {Restores 10 MP} - [color=gold]**Shurian's Anniversary Cake**[/color]- 5 Shuricoins {Restores 10 MP and HP} {Limited Edition} - [color=grey]Stack of 10 Arrows[/color] - 3 Shuricoins {Consumed Upon Attack} - [color=grey]Small Enchant Scroll[/color]- 7 Shuricoins {Imbue an element{Wi/F/E/Wa} onto a weapon. Temporarily.} - [color=grey]Glass Bottle[/color]- 1 Shuricoin {It's Empty!} - [color=brown]Water[/color] - 1 Shuricoin {Don't wanna get thirsty in game do you?} - [color=brown]Bread[/color]- 1 Shuricoin {A good way to fill your belly!}
And that's all. Umu, I have done a great service indeed, now, it's your turn! Create your characters as fast as possible! I'll... ahem. Get ready for the start party... Umu. I shall wait!
EDITOR'S EDIT: Apologies, it seems like Shurian the little joker did not put in Shoes for the last part of the CS. Please Edit that into your Character Sheets.
> # [color=gold]Umu[/color] > Level 60- Max HP: 7686/7686 MP: 1098/1098 [color=gold]_Lord of the Flowers._[/color] [color=dgrey]_Shopkeeper._[/color] STR: 50 + 17 DEX: 35 + 3 STA: 112 +10 Weapon: [color=gold]**Olympia**[/color] (45 Mt - Increases Healing Effectiveness by 50%) {Umbrella-Shield} Equipment: [color=gold]**Regalia's Ribbon**[/color] {+14 STR, + 3 DEX, Increase Healing Effectiveness by 20%} [color=gold]**Regalia's Gown**[/color] {+10 STA, Reduce Damage Taken by 10%, Reduce 20% Critical Damage Taken} [color=silver]**Olympia's Gloves**[/color] {+3 STR, +7 DEX, Charm Probability Up 10%} [color=silver]**Regalia's Heels**[/color] {+100 MP, - 7 DEX, Mana Consumption +10%, 1 Use Guts.} Inventory: HEY NO LOOKING IN HERE! **Skills:** Imperial Privilege EX: Increase Attack and Defense by 20%. Restores 1000 + 700 HP. Taunt B: Increases Hate value of all enemies in a set radius around you, forcing them to attack you. Invictus Spiritus EX: Revives with 10% HP once knocked out. Can only be used once in an encounter. Glory to Me! EX: Increases Defense(30%) and Restores HP(2000) to all other party members. I'll Save You! : Restores 400 MP to yourself and a person of your choice. Flowers for the Earth: Increases one ally's attack and MP Regen Rate. **Passives:** It's Me! - Increases HP Threshold of all allies in party by 1000. MP Regen rate is increased by 20%. Self Resistance to Mental Debuffs is greatly increased. **Special:** Riveting Performance, Fae Calestius - Deal Heavy Damage to all enemies within a small radius. Restores MP per each enemy hit. Increases Attack of all allies in your party that scales with each enemy hit.
_EDITOR'S NOTE: Hey, What are you doing? You forgot to put your age so I put it there for you. I wonder when she'll realise._ ```Umu, I can do whatever I want.```
_EDITOR's NOTE: She's a 24 year old lady. Hag you can call her._

item.title: [Character Sheet] Clash Online. {E,C,D}
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Ruri

Level 7 - 104 EXP to Level Up
HP: 80/80
MP: 38/38
PVP Rank- Newbie
World Completion Rate: 0%
STR: 20
DEX: 5
STA: 8

Inventory:

Weapon: Bow, 58 Arrows
Equipment: Beginner’s Armour, Beginner’s Leggings, Beginner’s Gloves, Beginner’s Shoes
Shuribag - (20 slots)
Water: 10 Servings
Bread: 10 Servings
1 “Shurian’s Anniversary Cake”
1 “Small Enchant Scroll”
5 “Small HP Potion”
Wallet: 317 Shuricoins


“Yo! I’m Ruri… and I’m gonna be the best there is in this game! Don’t ya dare doubt it either!”
:// Female, 14, 5’3’ - outgoing and passionate about both their interests and their skills in said interests - an adept fantasy and video game nerd, though not so adept as far as social skills and being polite goes.

Read full topic
